experiences.title: Leadership Experience
experiences.subtitle: Student Union Government, President
workDescription: Led a team of 12 executive members in planning and executing various initiatives.
Represented student interests in discussions with Polytechnic administration.
Organized and managed multiple programs such Students’ Cultural Carnival that positively impacted the student body

experiences.title: Committee Membership
experiences.subtitle: Member, Budget Monitoring Committee
workDescription: Contributed to the review and analysis of the school budget, ensuring alignment with Polytechnic and 2013 Need Assessment goals.
Participated in budget meetings to provide input on resource allocation and financial priorities.

experiences.title: Bursar
experiences.subtitle: Abubakar Isa Ahmadu Primary School, Mubi, Adamawa State
workDescription: Oversaw the disbursement of funds, ensuring compliance with school policies and regulations.
Handled payroll, invoicing, and financial documentation
